title: unable to use force_plot
body:
I am able to generate plots for individual observations but not as a whole. X_train is a df.
shap.force_plot(explainer.expected_value[1], shap_values[1], choosen_instance)##This is working
But,
shap.force_plot(explainer.expected_value, shap_values, X_train)  ##error
gives error.

AssertionError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-21-8d7548528691> in <module>()
----> 1 shap.force_plot(explainer.expected_value, shap_values, X_train)

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/shap/plots/force.py in force_plot(base_value, shap_values, features, feature_names, out_names, link, plot_cmap, matplotlib, show, figsize, ordering_keys, ordering_keys_time_format, text_rotation)
     72 
     73 
---> 74     assert not type(shap_values) == list, "The shap_values arg looks looks multi output, try shap_values[i]."
     75 
     76     link = convert_to_link(link)

AssertionError: The shap_values arg looks looks multi output, try shap_values[i].
